title: Oh cool, ALL event missions are going to give minuscule amounts of tokens and have "passes" now
body:
Degenerate company

Remember when missions would give you just enough tokens for the highest reward OR about 3-5 orbs?

Not anymore, apparently. ONE snowdown mission with the rest of the tokens being from a """~~season~~ event pass.""" What an actual fucking joke 

Shit, orbs don't even ***exist*** anymore. We just get masterwork chests for double the tokens or a fucking _champion shard_ for the same amount as an orb was before

With fewer tokens given
